title: Ex-Rikers Guard Sentenced to Prison for Smuggling and Selling Drugs
text:
Published By: NYTimes NY Region - Today 
Austin Romain, 33, was convicted last year of smuggling contraband to inmates who sold it to fellow inmates, a scheme in which he was paid $...
